title: Which website do you prefer for K-pop information, Soompi or AllKpop? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t like either website. I’m better off just asking someone I follow here on Quora that works in the Industry. But if I had to choose, Soompi seems more reliable. allKpop, like most journalists these days, over do things and make something look twenty times worse than it is. Or they’ll make you think something bad happened with an article title. Pure stupidity if you ask me.

Easy. Soompi. Allkpop and koreaboo are notorious for spreading false information and creating drama to get clicks. I understand the appeal of Allkpop as it will have more articles about groups than soompi, but I refuse to support a website that helped in falsely ruining idol's reputations and is biased towards/ against certain groups.
